Text.Value: The same adamantine forge the duergar were harping on about? Interesting.
Further mention of the adamantine forge. The duergar were looking for it too.
The 'Adamantine Forge'. Duergar were talking about the same thing.
This 'Adamantine Forge' - the duergar spoke of it as well.
An Adamantine Forge. The duergar spoke of this.
An Adamantine Forge - seems that duergar was on to something after all.
The Adamantine Forge - we heard of it from the duergar.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: "These records also mention the Adamantine Forge, looks like they've been searching for it."

Text.Value: This is the same forge the memory shard showed us, surely?
Another clue about the adamantine forge. Unnecessary now that the memory shard revealed its location.
More talk of that forge. The memory shard already showed us where to go.
More forge talk. The memory shard showed us where to go.
The adamantine forge - its location already revealed of course, thanks to the memory shard.
So much talk of this Adamantine Forge - and the memory shard already showed us where to find it.
The Adamantine Forge - the memory shard already revealed its location.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: "These records also mention the Adamantine Forge, looks like they've been searching for it."

Text.Value: Seems the mad drow wasn't the only one searching for this forge.
Plenty more were looking for the forge it seems. The drow had competition.
Mad drow wasn't the only forge fan in the underdark.
The mad drow spoke of this forge, too - perhaps his mind wasn't entirely addled.
Seems the mad drow wasn't alone in hunting this adamantine forge.
The drow with the hook horrors - he was searching for this Adamantine Forge too.
That mad drow was searching for this forge, too. Seems he wasn't the only one.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: "These records also mention the Adamantine Forge, looks like they've been searching for it."

Text.Value: Our wizard friend Dhourn was looking for this forge too. A popular spot.
The adamantine forge again. Dhourn, too, was looking to find it.
Ol' Dhourn was searching for that same forge.
The Adamantine Forge - that blowhard Dhourn was searching for it.
The adamantine forge - the same the wizard Dhourn was hunting for, it seems.
The Adamantine Forge. Our statuesque friend Dhourn was keen to find it.
The Adamantine Forge - the wizard Dhourn was set on finding it.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: "These records also mention the Adamantine Forge, looks like they've been searching for it."

Text.Value: The same forge from the wizard's notes? The notes that mentioned a guardian?
Another reference to the adamantine forge. No mention of a guardian this time.
Forge again. The wizard's notes mentioned a guardian, right?
The Adamantine Forge again. The last journal mentioned a guardian...
More about this forge. But the other notes mentioned some sort of guardian...
Seems there's more than one searching for this forge. No word of its guardian this time, though.
This forge again. That drow wizard's notes mentioned some kind of guardian.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: "These records also mention the Adamantine Forge, looks like they've been searching for it."

Text.Value: That's the same forge the drow's corpse mentioned, surely?
The dead drow spoke of a forge. Must be the same one.
That dead drow spoke of the Adamantine Forge too. Popular spot.
This 'Adamantine Forge' - the dead drow spoke of finding it.
An adamantine forge? The same as that dead drow spoke of, surely.
The Adamantine Forge - our dead drow friend was searching for it.
This 'Adamantine Forge' - the same the drow's corpse spoke of?

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: "These records also mention the Adamantine Forge, looks like they've been searching for it."

Text.Value: That enchanted journal mentioned an adamantine forge too. Seems popular.
That enchanted journal made note of an adamantine forge as well. I must be on to something.
Everyone wants forge. Forge, forge, forge.
The Adamantine Forge - the enchanted journal spoke of it as well. Curious.
That journal mentioned the adamantine forge as well. Quite the obsession.
This Adamantine Forge - the same that disguised journal mentioned, surely?
That disguised journal spoke of this Adamantine Forge as well. Interesting.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: "These records also mention the Adamantine Forge, looks like they've been searching for it."

Text.Value: Seems like a popular spot, this forge. Everyone's looking for it.
Further mention of the adamantine forge. Someone was dead set on finding it.
Everyone wants a piece of this forge.
Seems this forge was most coveted, and for good reason.
More talk of this adamantine forge. Quite the attraction, it seems.
More forge talk? I figured it for a tall tale. Now I'm not so sure.
Another mention of this forge. Seems a few drow were searching for it.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: "These records also mention the Adamantine Forge, looks like they've been searching for it."

Synopsis: The party comments on learning about the Adamantine Forge from the second source (another drow wizard out of total three).
